refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect2.title: cairo_translate ()
refsect2.para: Modifies the current transformation matrix (CTM) by translating the user-space origin by (tx, ty). This offset is interpreted as a user-space coordinate according to the CTM in place before the new call to cairo_translate. In other words, the translation of the user-space origin takes place after any existing transformation.

listitem.simpara: amount to translate in the X direction
amount to translate in the Y direction

refsect2.title: cairo_scale ()
refsect2.para: Modifies the current transformation matrix (CTM) by scaling the X and Y user-space axes by sx and sy respectively. The scaling of the axes takes place after any existing transformation of user space.

listitem.simpara: scale factor for the X dimension
scale factor for the Y dimension

refsect2.title: cairo_rotate ()
refsect2.para: Modifies the current transformation matrix (CTM) by rotating the user-space axes by angle radians. The rotation of the axes takes places after any existing transformation of user space. The rotation direction for positive angles is from the positive X axis toward the positive Y axis.

listitem.simpara: angle (in radians) by which the user-space axes will be rotated

refsect2.title: cairo_transform ()
refsect2.para: Modifies the current transformation matrix (CTM) by applying matrix as an additional transformation. The new transformation of user space takes place after any existing transformation.

listitem.simpara: a transformation to be applied to the user-space axes

refsect2.title: cairo_set_matrix ()
refsect2.para: Modifies the current transformation matrix (CTM) by setting it equal to matrix.

listitem.simpara: a transformation matrix from user space to device space

refsect2.title: cairo_get_matrix ()
refsect2.para: Stores the current transformation matrix (CTM) into matrix.

refsect2.title: cairo_identity_matrix ()
refsect2.para: Resets the current transformation matrix (CTM) by setting it equal to the identity matrix. That is, the user-space and device-space axes will be aligned and one user-space unit will transform to one device-space unit.

refsect2.title: cairo_user_to_device ()
refsect2.para: Transform a coordinate from user space to device space by multiplying the given point by the current transformation matrix (CTM).

refsect2.title: cairo_user_to_device_distance ()
refsect2.para: Transform a distance vector from user space to device space. This function is similar to cairo_user_to_device() except that the translation components of the CTM will be ignored when transforming (dx,dy).

listitem.simpara: X component of a distance vector (in/out parameter)
Y component of a distance vector (in/out parameter)

refsect2.title: cairo_device_to_user ()
refsect2.para: Transform a coordinate from device space to user space by multiplying the given point by the inverse of the current transformation matrix (CTM).

refsect2.title: cairo_device_to_user_distance ()
refsect2.para: Transform a distance vector from device space to user space. This function is similar to cairo_device_to_user() except that the translation components of the inverse CTM will be ignored when transforming (dx,dy).

listitem.simpara: X component of a distance vector (in/out parameter)
Y component of a distance vector (in/out parameter)
